stripped_text: Play only if the Runner accessed a card during their last turn. Trace[4]. If successful, trash 1 installed program with an install cost of X or less, where X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength.
text:
Play only if the Runner accessed a card during their last turn.
Trace[4]. If successful, trash 1 installed program with an install cost of X or less, where X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength.
title: Trojan Horse
